quotes.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is no way around hard work.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.quote: No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs
